item.title: Workstation
item.description: A clear, half-height and semi-transparent chair helps not filling too much visual space. Unfortunately most good looking and ergonomic chairs have wheels, which is understandable because mobility is very functional. On the other hand, it’s also useful to optimize for floor clearance for the ease of using robot vacuums.
